p: The beef meat was minced in a meat grinder and divided into five groups according to the following treatments: Control (no addition), 0.3% v/w MEO, 0.5% v/w MEO, 0.3% v/w ZEO, and 0.5% v/w ZEO. After appropriate homogenization, the samples were separately packed in UV-sterilized polyethylene bags and stored at 7Â°C for subsequent analysis on days: 0, 3, 5, 7, and 9. Distilled water was added in control samples instead of EO.
